sentence.text: Implementation of an Outsourced Transnational Service of Clinical Decision Support System.

The aim of this study is to describe the implementation and evaluation of an outsourced Clinical Decision Support Systems (CDSS) service of drug-drug interaction (DDI) alerts in an Uruguayan outpatient healthcare network
5 alerts were triggered of every 1000 prescriptions
Clinicians accepted 44% of the total alerts
In conclusion, the implementation of CDSS was achievable
